body.transcript:
Hello! Welcome to Harmony Music School's customer support. My name is Aaron Morris. How can I assist you today?

Hi Aaron. I'm Crystal Jones. I'm having a hard time managing my kids' classes and schedules.

I understand, Crystal. We aim to make scheduling as seamless as possible. Could I please have your email address to access your account?

Sure, it's crystal.jones@email.com.

Thank you, Crystal. Let me pull up your account. Can you also provide me with your phone number for verification purposes?

Of course, it's five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

Great, I have found your account. I see your children are enrolled in piano and guitar lessons. Is there a specific issue you're encountering?

Yes, the system keeps changing their lesson times, and it's becoming quite frustrating.

I apologize for the inconvenience, Crystal. Let's try to resolve this. I will escalate the issue for technical support to ensure it gets fixed quickly.

Thank you, Aaron. That would be very helpful.

You're welcome, Crystal. Thank you for your patience and understanding. We will follow up soon. Have a great day!

analysis.body: In this conversation, Aaron Morris from a random business discusses data management with Crystal Jones. The agent provides assistance and information about Music School.
